relics.name: Imaginary Friend
relics.description: Whenever you play a card or draw an Id card, gain 1 Ephemeral.
relics.flavorText: They'll forget about me. They always do.

relics.name: A Hole Where a Sister Should Be
relics.description: The first time you draw an Id card each combat, gain [E] and draw 1 card.
relics.flavorText: It hurt. It hurt to remember the sound of her laugh, the touch of her mind against her own.

relics.name: Bloodstained White Rose
relics.description: At the start of combat, apply 3 Terror to a random enemy.
relics.flavorText: The treaty was broken, and the White Rose of Chireiden was stained forever.

relics.name: Letters to Reimu
relics.description: Whenever a card is exhausted, gain 2 Temporary HP.
relics.flavorText: Everything comes to an end, even the dream they had believed in. Even this story must have a sad, tragic end.

relics.name: Teeth and Claws
relics.description: The first time you apply a debuff each turn, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: Not everyone plays by the rules. Those who don’t tend to be dealt with. Swiftly.

relics.name: Echoes of a Dead Girl
relics.flavorText: She wasn't sure if there was anything left of her sister in that shell, that hollow existence that could only mindlessly follow its primal urges.

relics.name: Imperfect Metamorphosis
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 2 cards into random Id cards.
relics.flavorText: It was the first day of spring, and nobody cared.

relics.name: Colorful Days
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Ephemeral now triggers at 20 stacks instead of 15.
relics.flavorText: Everything I saw, everything I heard, everything I felt . . . all the scenery around me started to take color.
